item.description:
Join us for the latest iteration of the game that cannot be killed.

Players are Troubleshooters in the service of the all-wise, all-powerful and all-beneficient Computer. The Troubleshooters root out vile and irrational Treason (and nothing else!) from a future Utopia.

This is the September installment of our series of one-shot indie RPG experiences to be offered monthly over the course of 2010. Each month will feature a different GM running a new game. This month's GM is Ben.
item.how_to_find_us: Look for us at the table where everyone one is smiling as hard as they can.
item.name: September One-Shot - Paranoia
